name: Agito
tagline: Agility for the Insurers of Tomorrow
about:
Agito Software & Consulting | LinkedIn‘de 39.656 takipçi Agility for the Insurers of Tomorrow | Holistic technology partner of insurance.

Agito was established in 1997 to offer insurance industry-specific software solutions and services. The Company's fields of operation cover product development and implementation of core business applications in health insurance, life insurance, private pension, and property&casualty insurance solutions.
